column1: Specifications: "21.5" Full HD PoE++ touchscreen designed for interactive digital signage applications."
Create dynamic digital signage content with UniFi Connect's layout creator

"Mounting": "VESA mount adapter (included)
Table stand (optional)
Surface mount (optional)
Arm mount (optional)
Flush mount (optional)"
"Connectivity": "(1) GbE RJ45 port\n(1) USB-C port (Reserved feature for future function update)\nBluetooth® 4.2"
"Ambient operating temperature": "0 to 40° C (32 to 104° F)"
"Management application": "UniFi Connect web: Version 2.1.14 and laterUniFi Connect iOS™ and Android™:  Version 1.0.0 and later"
